participant_1.background:
I spent a week in Mexico eating all of the Mexican food I could find.
i live in a medium sized city.
I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better.
I drive an expensive car that I bought with my own money.
in the evenings i watch the door at a club where they play punkrock.

participant_2.background:
I'm not a morning person, I like to take my time getting ready in the morning.
my father is in prison.
I went to the cinema with friends to watch the latest action movie.
I enjoy playing board games with my friends, especially ones that are strategic and require thinking.
I love the feeling of freedom and adventure that comes with riding my bike.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Hi! It's going well! I'm excited for the weekend, I'm going to the cinema with some friends to watch the latest action movie. What are you up to?
I'm going to the cinema too! I'm going with my boyfriend to see the new romantic comedy. I'm excited to see it, but I'm also a little nervous because I'm not a huge fan of romantic comedies.
I love romantic comedies! I think they're so funny and cute. I'm sure you'll enjoy it!
I hope so! What do you do for fun?
I love to play board games with my friends. I think they're a great way to socialize and have fun. I also love riding my bike. It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
That sounds fun! I love board games too. I'm not very good at them, but I always have a lot of fun playing them. I don't ride my bike as much as I used to, but I used to love it. It's so freeing!
It is! I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
I love Monopoly. It's so much fun to try to make money and buy all the properties. I always get really competitive when I play it.
I love Monopoly too! I'm always trying to bankrupt my opponents.
Me too! It's so much fun to be able to take all of their money and leave them with nothing.
I know! It's the best feeling.
I'm excited to go to the cinema this weekend. I'm sure I'll have a lot of fun.
I'm sure you will! It's going to be a great movie.
